## encodeString() function

Encode a string to UTF-8 bytes. Equivalent to `Buffer.from(text, 'utf8')`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function encodeString(text: string): Uint8Array;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**
